overview: Thomas Hughes serves as the Director of Product Management as well as some time Business Development executive for KeyWifi. Prior to KeyWifi, Hughes worked in financial and business information companies, helping them transform themselves as successive waves of technology upended traditional businesses like publishing, credit and financial advice. He built trading floors for giant banks and brokerage firms, then transitioned to the companies that feed the information into global markets. Managed digital strategy for the research business of Moody’s for 13 years, then served as COO and President of a specialized financial-analytics trading business.
